title: Harassment and stereotypes pushing women out of tech
text:
Harassment and stereotypes pushing women out of tech 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Women are being pushed out of tech, and even reporting on tech. But who is to blame for the harassment and discomfort?...
